title: Dream Land
description:
Tomoki Okumura is a young man who was kicked out of his apartment. Looking for a job, he spots an advertisement for an assistant position. He meets a man, Niwa, for the interview but soon finds out that this isn't your normal interview, nor is Niwa your normal porn director. A story of firsts for both the naive and the experienced.
[hr][b][u]Italian / Italiano[/u][/b]
[spoiler]Tomoki Okumura, un giovane ragazzo, viene sfrattato dal suo appartamento. In cerca di lavoro, trova un annuncio dove cercano assistenti.
Al colloquio incontra un ragazzo, Niwa, che ben presto gli farà scoprire che questo lavoro è abbastanza particolare...[/spoiler]
